/usr/bin/c++  -W -Wall -pedantic -Wno-non-virtual-dtor -Wno-long-long -Wwrite-strings -Wpointer-arith -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-variadic-macros -Wshadow -pipe -std=c++11  -pthread -std=c++11 -m64 -I/home/lsh/Documents/ROOT/build/include -O3 -DNDEBUG -fno-trapping-math -ftree-vectorize -fno-math-errno -O3 -DNDEBUG  -L/home/lsh/Documents/ROOT/build/lib -lCore -lImt -lRIO -lNet -lHist -lGraf -lGraf3d -lGpad -lROOTVecOps -lTree -lTreePlayer -lRint -lPostscript -lMatrix -lPhysics -lMathCore -lThread -lMultiProc -lROOTDataFrame -pthread -lm -ldl -rdynamic
